name: CSP Bypass Analyzer
description: Analyzes Content-Security-Policy for bypass vectors including JSONP endpoints, Angular/React gadgets, and vulnerable CDN whitelists
author: Dominator Team
cwe_name: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
remediation: Use strict CSP with nonces or hashes. Avoid unsafe-inline and unsafe-eval. Remove JSONP endpoints from script-src. Use CSP report-uri for monitoring.
